:::: Hell Beast sat in his suite, sipping a warm drink and filling out paper 
work that he had been neglecting. The last few days had been very stressful 
on him and his team, they all needed a break. Unfortunetly, in war there were 
no breaks. :::

::: A beep came from the door. It opened and in filed Marine, Gremlin, 
Pheniox, and Transanulas. They entered and made themselfs comfortable in a 
small sitting area. :::

::: Hell Beast rose with his drink and joined them. The motioned to the Dat 
pads on a small table. They each picked them up and read the memo on them. :::

::: Marine, the giant turtle bot who had apponited himself with the rank of 
General, spoke first. ::: Commander Hell Beast, when is this project to be 
completed?

::: Before Hell Beast could answer, Transanulas interrupted ::: It cant be 
done! Its an insane plan!

::: Hell Beast ::: Spider, be quiet!

::: He picked up a Dat pad and read what he had downloaded there earlier ---

    Project Disrupt
Selected Individuals: Team Leader- General Marine
Main Technical officer- Transanulas
Assistant Technical Officer - Pheniox
Defense Officer- Gremlin

Outline-
Project Disrupt' main goal is to disrupt and stop all communications of the 
Newmcomers. A tower sending out Eneron radiation on radio signals on the 
Newcomers communications band. With there communications placed on a halt, 
they will have to manually deliver messages to each other and will not be 
able to over hear or spy on Predacon, Maximal, or Allience transmissions.

Setup:
Under General Marines command, Transanulas and Pheniox will construct a tower 
within the winding caves of the great canyon. Gremlin will supply the defense 
systems, which will include generator shielding, handheld pistols, and a 
single rechargable assult canon. 
Construction will take three days and will be tested on the fourth. By the 
fith day the Disrupt Project will be in full swing and the tower will be 
running ull power. 

Personal Note:
" Predacons, we wil lcrush the Newcomers and rape them of there resources. 
Let nothing stop you from building this tower. We will succeed. "

::: Hell Beast smiled at his work. Transanulas still had his doubts, but 
everyone else seems very optimistic. They left and began to pack. Later on 
Hell Beast watched them go taking the supplies with them. :::

~~~~~~~~~

::: Marine looked at the construction site. It was deep within a cave and had 
one small entrance which Gremlin was guarding with his generator shileding. 
Transanulas and Pheniox had begun the construction of the base, and for now 
Marine stood waiting for the first attack wich was inevitable. :::
